https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kGBcXlbxkq0H8KNP3uMWQzpJyBm.jpg Audra McDonald, already renowned for her virtuosity in classical and Broadway song, brings her talents to new genres by interpreting works of pop and contemporary composers, including pieces from her album Build a Bridge. Audra McDonald and Friends: Build a Bridge
